post:
Hi guys,

Well we celebrate our  company in Hungary and want to provide 10 free account to lowendtalk clients. Actually we are three years in business... so have to celebrate. :)

**What we provide:**

2GB space , litespeed webserver , directadmin , directadmin custom theme, **R1Soft hourly backup**

If you want this... please reply here (No PM actually) then order and open a ticket with your lowendtalk user name.

**Order it here:** [https://online.spaceweb.eu/order/main/packages/ssd-cached-shared-litespeed-plan/?group_id=25](https://online.spaceweb.eu/order/main/packages/ssd-cached-shared-litespeed-plan/?group_id=25)

**(2GB Plan)**

TOS: [https://online.spaceweb.eu/tos.pdf](https://online.spaceweb.eu/tos.pdf)

Privacy: [https://online.spaceweb.eu/privacy.pdf](https://online.spaceweb.eu/privacy.pdf)


`You have to be registered there more then 1 year and you need at least 50 post to get the offer.`

Regards,
Peter

**NO more free account. PM for 50% Off if you need.**
